name: TRIP REPORT | LOT Polish Airlines Embraer 170 (ECONOMY CLASS) Rzeszów to Warsaw
description:
My first trip report on LOT! SP-LDG, one of LOT's many Embraer regional jets flew me from the largest city in southeast Poland to the capital city in Warsaw. Like Lufthansa's CRJ, I've flown this route quite a few times, but this was the first time I've documented the experience instead of just filming out the window. But, unlike Lufthansa, you won't actually see me complaining about the legroom in this one! Enjoy.

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

VIDEO LOG:
00:05 - Pre-Security
02:10 - Post-Security
02:15 - At The Gate
04:00 - Boarding
04:50 - On board
07:30 - Takeoff
10:10 - In Flight
11:30 - Landing

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION:
Airline: LOT Polish Airlines (LOT/LO)
Aircraft: Embraer ERJ-170LR (E170)
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: New (2012)
Engines: 2x GE CF34-8E5 
Registration: SP-LDG
Route: Rzeszów (RZE) - Warsaw-Chopin Airport (WAW)
Flight Time: 25m
Seat: 11A
Callsign: LOT 3806
Date Filmed: August 2018
